description: Try our easy to follow Easy Bolognese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Easy Bolognese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide spaghetti bolognese among bowls, then serve topped with grated parmesan cheese and fresh herbs.
